title.en: Remedial Instruction of Estonian Language I
Methodology of Mother Tongue for Children with SEN I
title.et: Eesti keele õpe erivajadustega lastele I

description.en:
Reading competence and its development.
Reading difficulties for students with learning disabilities and students with intellectual disabilities.
Difficulties in understanding texts.
Planning a reading lesson for students with learning disabilities/intellectual disabilities.
Developing oral speech and storytelling skills. 
Skills: observing lessons, composing of plans of lessons and organize them
description.et: Lugemispädevus ja selle kujundamine. Lugemisraskused õpiraskustega ja intellektipuudega õpilastel. Tekstide mõistmise raskused. Lugemistunni kavanadamine. Jutustamisoskuse arendamine.

objectives.en: Provide knowledge of speech development opportunities, text analysis, and reading lesson design and delivery for students with learning disabilities and intellectual disabilities.
objectives.et: Anda teadmisi kõne arendamise võimalustest, teksti analüüsist ja lugemistunni kavandamisest ning läbiviimisest õpiraskustega ja kerge intellektipuudega õpilastega.

learning_outcomes.en: Students will acquire skills to prepare and conduct mother tongue lessons according to the needs of pupils with learning difficulties.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilased omandavad oskused eesti keele tundide ettevalmistamiseks ja läbiviimiseks õpiraskustega õpilaste vajadustest lähtuvalt.
